author: donaldp
msg: Disable test looking for console if there is no console attached

author: ieb
msg: SLING-3154 Add Topology Message Verification to the Discovery service.
Adds signatures and optional encryption using JDK provided HmacSHA256 and
AES 128 bit encryption to discovery messages. To enable the Config component
must be configured. Once configured, the IP whitelist is disabled and replaced
